--- cast_as_typename.sql
CAST('order_number: "123"' AS examples.shipping.`Order`)
--- AST
&ast.CastExpr{
  Cast:   0,
  Rparen: 55,
  Expr:   &ast.StringLiteral{
    ValuePos: 5,
    ValueEnd: 26,
    Value:    "order_number: \"123\"",
  },
  Type: &ast.NamedType{
    Name: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 30,
          NameEnd: 38,
          Name:    "examples",
        },
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 39,
          NameEnd: 47,
          Name:    "shipping",
        },
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 48,
          NameEnd: 55,
          Name:    "Order",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CAST("order_number: \"123\"" AS examples.shipping.`Order`)
